document_data.mainbody:
Thoroar the Mediogre was a merchant who sold his wares on the Sword Coast during the late 15 century DR.
Thoroar sold a variety of goods at his merchants stall, including a variety of potions, gold trade bars, healing kits that allowed people to treat their own injuries, and even small portable altars that allowed them to pay homage to their deity while far off from a temple.
During the Siege of Helms Hold circa the , Thoroar set up shop at the Last Redoubt war camp just outside the city of Helms Hold.
